titles.title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide that certified nurse-midwife services are covered under part B of Medicare.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 1/6/1987--Introduced. Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to provide coverage for nurse-midwife services under the supplementary medical insurance program (part B of title XVIII).
